text: DD Lakshadweep is a state owned TV channel telecasting from Doordarshan. ==See also== * List of programs broadcast by DD National * All India Radio * Ministry of Information and Broadcasting * DD Direct Plus * List of South Asian television channels by country ==External links== * Doordarshan Official Internet site * Doordarshan news site * An article at PFC Category:Doordarshan Category:Foreign television channels broadcasting in the United Kingdom Category:Television channels and stations established in 1998 Category:Indian direct broadcast satellite services
title: DD Lakshadweep
